00049 // Starts the list
00050 void init_list(processes *procs){
00051         procs->size = 0;
00052 }

00054 // List the processes (running or stopped) in the shell
00055 void jobs(processes p){
00056         int i;
00057         
00058         if(p.size == 0)
00059                 printf("There is no processes neither running nor stopped\n");
00060         else
00061                 for(i = 0; i < p.size; i++)
00062                         printf("[%d] [%d]\t%s\t%s\n", i + 1, p.list[i].pid, p.list[i].name, p.list[i].status);
00063 }
00064 
00065 //Encontra o processo na lista através do seu pid
00066 int find_process(processes *pcs, int pid){
00067         int i = 0;
00068 
00069         while(i<MAX){
00070                 if(pcs->list[i].pid == pid)return i;
00071                 i++;
00072         }
00073         return -1;
00074 }
00075 
00076 // Insert
00077 void insert_process(processes *procs, process proc){
00078         int i;
00079 
00080         i = procs->size;
00081 
00082         procs->list[i].pid = proc.pid;
00083         strcpy(procs->list[i].name, proc.name);
00084         strcpy(procs->list[i].status, proc.status);
00085         procs->size++;
00086 }
00087 
00088 // When a process ends running, removes it from the list
00089 void remove_process(processes *pcs, int pid){
00090         int i, j, found;
00091 
00092         i = 0;
00093         found = 0;
00094 
00095         while(!found){
00096                 fflush(stdout);
00097 
00098                 if(pcs->list[i].pid == pid){
00099 
00100                         for(j = i; j < pcs->size; j++){
00101                                 pcs->list[j] = pcs->list[j + 1];
00102                         }
00103                         pcs->size--;    
00104                         found = 1;
00105                 }
00106                 i++;
00107         }
00108 }

00149 /*
00150  * Capturando o SIGCHLD em background
00151  */
00152 void bgcatch_SIGCHLD(int signum)
00153 {
00154         int estado;
00155 
00156         int filho = waitpid (-1, &estado, WUNTRACED | WCONTINUED);
00157         int i = find_process(&procs,filho);
00158         if (WIFSTOPPED(estado)){
00159 
00160                 strcpy(procs.list[i].status,STP);
00161                 printf("[%d] [%d]\t%s\t%s\n:>", i+1 , procs.list[i].pid, procs.list[i].name, procs.list[i].status);
00162         }
00163         else if (WIFCONTINUED(estado)){
00164 
00165                 strcpy(procs.list[i].status,RUN);
00166                 printf("[%d] [%d]\t%s\t%s\n", i+1 , procs.list[i].pid, procs.list[i].name, procs.list[i].status);
00167         }               
00168         else if(WIFEXITED(estado) || WIFSIGNALED(estado)){
00169                 printf("[%d] [%d]\t%s\tDead\n:>", i+1 , procs.list[i].pid, procs.list[i].name);
00170                 remove_process(&procs, filho);
00171         }
00172         fflush(stdout);
00173 }

00195 command_code inner_parser(processes *procs, const char *inner_command, int background) {
00196         command_code comm_code = COMM_NOTFOUND;
00197         char splitted[TOKENS][BUFFER_SIZE] = {{0}};
00198         char *command = NULL;
00199         char *string_ptr = NULL;
00200         char *inner_context;
00201         int num_of_parameters = 0;
00202         int i;
00203 
00204         // Parses the command line
00205         string_ptr = strtok_r((char*)inner_command, " ", &inner_context);
00206         if(string_ptr) {
00207                 strncpy(splitted[0], string_ptr, BUFFER_SIZE);
00208                 string_ptr = strtok_r(NULL, " ", &inner_context);
00209                 for(i = 1; i < TOKENS && string_ptr != NULL; i++) {
00210                         strncpy(splitted[i], string_ptr, BUFFER_SIZE);
00211                         string_ptr = strtok_r(NULL, " ", &inner_context);
00212                         num_of_parameters++;
00213                         
00214                 }
00215                 num_of_parameters++;
00216                 command = splitted[0];
00217                 
00218         } else {
00219                 printf("Syntax error.\n");
00220                 return COMM_NOTFOUND;
00221         }
00222 
00223         check_redirect(splitted, &num_of_parameters);
00224 
00225         if (!check_pipe(splitted, &num_of_parameters)) {
00226                 comm_code = executioner(procs, command, splitted, num_of_parameters,background);
00227         }
00228         
00229         redirected();
00230         fflush(stdout);
00231         return comm_code;
00232 }

00239 command_code parse_command(processes *procs, char *command_line) {
00240         command_code rets = COMM_NOTFOUND;
00241         char splitted[BUFFER_SIZE] = "";
00242         char *string_amps = NULL;
00243         char *parser_context;
00244         int i = 0;
00245         int background = 0;
00246 
00247         for(i = strlen(command_line); i > 0 && command_line[i] != '&'; i--) {
00248                 if(command_line[i] != ' ' && command_line[i] != '\0') break;
00249         }
00250 
00251         if(command_line[i] == '&' && command_line[i-1] == ' ') {
00252                 background = 1;
00253                 command_line[i] = '\0';
00254         }
00255         i = 0;
00256 
00257         // First, try to get &&, so we'll run more than one command
00258         string_amps = strtok_r((char*)command_line, "&&", &parser_context);
00259         if(string_amps) {
00260                 
00261                 strncpy(splitted, string_amps, BUFFER_SIZE);
00262 
00263                 string_amps = strtok_r(NULL, "&&", &parser_context);
00264                                                         //if the last is in background and this is the last
00265                 rets = inner_parser(procs, splitted,(background&&(!string_amps)));
00266 
00267                 EXIT_IF_I_MUST(rets);
00268 
00269                 splitted[0] = '\0';
00270                 
00271                 for(i = 1; i < TOKENS && string_amps != NULL; i++) {
00272                         strncpy(splitted, string_amps, BUFFER_SIZE);
00273                         string_amps = strtok_r(NULL, "&&", &parser_context);
00274 
00275                                                         //if the last is in background and this is the last
00276                         rets = inner_parser(procs, splitted,(background&&(!string_amps)));
00277                         EXIT_IF_I_MUST(rets);
00278                         
00279                         splitted[0] = '\0';
00280                 }
00281 
00282         }
00283         
00284         return rets;
00285 }

00291 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00292         int quit = 0;
00293         char buffer[BUFFER_SIZE] = {};
00294         command_code comm_code;
00295 
00296         init_list(&procs);
00297 
00298         user_info = getpwnam(getlogin());
00299                         
00300         printf("Welcome to %s!\n", NAME);
00301 
00302         while(!quit) {
00303                 //Sinais capturados em Background
00304             signal(SIGINT, bgcatch_SIGINT);
00305             signal(SIGCONT, bgcatch_SIGCONT);
00306             signal(SIGTSTP, bgcatch_SIGTSTP);
00307             signal(SIGCHLD, bgcatch_SIGCHLD);
00308 
00309                 fflush(stdout);
00310                 do {
00311                         printf(":> ");
00312                 }while(!readline(buffer, BUFFER_SIZE));
00313 
00314 //              printf("readline\n");
00315 //              fflush(stdout);
00316                 comm_code = parse_command(&procs, buffer);
00317 
00318                 if(comm_code == COMM_EXIT) {
00319                                 quit = 1;
00320                 }
00321                 fflush(stdout);
00322         }
00323                 
00324         printf("Buh-bye!\n");
00325         return 0;
00326 }
